quarks.metrics.oplets

Class RateMeter<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • quarks.oplet.core.AbstractOplet<I,O>
      • quarks.oplet.core.Pipe<T,T>
        • quarks.oplet.core.Peek<T>
          • quarks.metrics.oplets.SingleMetricAbstractOplet<T>
            • quarks.metrics.oplets.RateMeter<T>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.AutoCloseable, Consumer<T>, Oplet<T,T>

    public final class RateMeter<T>
extends SingleMetricAbstractOplet<T>
    A metrics oplet which measures current tuple throughput and one-, five-, and fifteen-minute exponentially-weighted moving averages.
    See Also:
